newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria Teximbank gets full banking licence - BNB.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria Teximbank gets full banking licence - BNB.

text.p: Bulgaria's private Teximbank on Friday received a full licence for domestic and international banking operations, a Bulgarian National Bank (BNB) official said.
"The BNB board granted a full banking licence to Teximbank on basis of fully paid-in capital required for operations abroad," a BNB official said.
Under Bulgaria's banking regulations minimum capital requirements for a full licence are 2.2 billion levs and for a domestic one 1.4 billion levs.
Teximbank's fully paid-in capital stood at 2.207 billion levs on March 31, the BNB official said.
Teximbank was licenced for domestic banking in 1993. -- Sofia Newsroom, 359-2-84561
